content:
last Sunday two Israeli Defense Forces soldiers spoke at Swarthmore on behalf of the Israeli Soldiers Stories campaign from Stand With Us a nonprofit organization whose mission is to inform the public about Israel combat antiSemitism and to stand up for Israel PERIOD

Email address

title: Aneesa Andrabi, Joelle Hageboutrous, Danny Hirschel-Burns and Timmy Hirschel-Burns, Author at The Phoenix
name: Swarthmore College
